metadata.title: CVE-2023-0047 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none. Reason:This candidate was in a CNA pool that was not assigned to any issues during2023. Notes: none.
